name: Beef Wellington
ingredients: 500g beef tenderloin, 200g mushrooms, 2 sheets puff pastry, 4 slices prosciutto, 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard, 1 egg (beaten), Salt and pepper
instructions: 1. Season the beef with salt and pepper and sear on all sides, 2. Cool the beef and brush with mustard, 3. Process mushrooms and cook until dry, 4. Wrap beef in mushroom mixture and prosciutto, 5. Wrap in puff pastry and brush with beaten egg, 6. Bake at 200Â°C for 35-40 minutes
